Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires signs to be posted at gasoline stations for consumers to contact the department of state regarding price or product problems
Summary: Requires signs to be posted at gasoline stations for consumers to contact the department of state regarding price or product problems.
LawCode: Amd ยง192, Ag & Mkts L; amd ยง94-a, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law and the executive law, in relation to protecting consumers from price gouging and product tampering of gasoline
